message.body: Gina Carrano is like the hottest female in the world
she's taller than me and is about 10-15 lbs lighter
I want to be Gina Carrano
I think you might be a lesbian
I just want to be her
I used to be in her weight class
Not sure if I'll ever be able to do the mma stuff though
AND NOW SHE'S MAKING OUT WITH CHANNING TATUM
CAN I PLEASE LIVE HER LIFE
I want to know what bras she wears
Have you watched Doctor Who at all?
And mine should look gigantic, but don't =(
"It seems like most people think she is either a 35C or a 34D cup."
Or a 36C, if the pickings are sim
when you're talking 22-25 oz at a time
I haven't had a drink since saturday
I can't decide if it's good or bad that we live so far away
I don't know, you appreciate it more?
The entry stages of tipsy for me are kind of what I imagine ecstasy to be like
I just want to get naked and roll around
ecstasy is a little more intense, sometimes too much so
hits you faster and is less intense
Of all drugs, ecstasy is pretty far down my list
I don't really recommend it to most people
Not a huge fan of "permanently fucking with your brain chemicals"
I mean, I know that's for relatively long-term use
moderation is key, I haven't done it that much
you can always get another oe
Seems a shame to break the streak
the action in this movie is so different
you know, I could come over...
I have to go to work in the morning
And you have no money lol
Other than alcohol, I've pretty much been straight edge
I'd almost say that it's stupid
at this point it does seem pointless, but I wouldn't rule it out entirely
I've done a shit-ton of drugs, but most of that is way in the past
It started with a generalized fear of my mother
But was predominantly an aversion to ceding control over my brain
Alcohol has the same effect, but I don't actually lose that much
If it matters, I have control
so I lifted, and there is definitely something wrong with my arm
same arm, but then it is the one I crushed in a car accident, so that might be it
mm, you're probably collapsing the reps too far
Whenever I tweak my elbow out, it's usually because I'm extending or collapsing reps too far
I don't know how else to explain it
gchat said something about you not receiving my chat
this movie has some really BIZARRE humor segments
yeah, you showed up as offline for a few minutes
oh, all I said was my elbow feels fine now so Im just going to work through it
Efi is on my couch having a conversation on her ipad
you know what her relationship is with Michael?
man, I did not think this beer would be quite that effective
but I hear she gets around
Did I tell you the story of how I ended up at her place alone?
I think I'd met her like twice at this point, she met us at the bar with her guy friend from work
I felt bad for him, he was completely intimidated by all the people
we end up leaving, without him
I drove my cousins car and went to a bar in wilmington with her and my friend kate
end up at efi's apartment in wilmington (before she moved to philly)
at this point, Im ready to leave
and she's like, "oh, stay..finish your wine!"
which was the last thing I wanted to do
so I sip some more wine hoping it would get better (it didnt) and she lays on the couch and puts her head in my lap
after a while of this, Im like, Ok i've gotta go
she's like, Oh, you can stay here...blah blah blah
something about how she would be lonely, I dunno her english is not that great
I use the excuse that I have to get my cousin's car back to him and leave
Have to say, I kind of envy her
I def don't go after anything that hard
but I just wasn't into it
I think she still hates me a little
man, when'd I start being all flirty in text messages
when you got tipsy, I'd imagine
I guess efi is staying in dan's room again =|
I just can't figure that out
Maybe I should spend some time alone with him and see
These chicks seem to think there's something interesting
haha, he did press 185 lbs 11 times, fairly impressive
I mean, don't get me wrong, I am a HUGE sucker for muscles
I'm not going to sleep with someone just b/c of their muscles
I mean, sure, it might bring the bar down a *bit*
its funny, the chicks that dan hooks up with Im never really into
in some cases yes, like efi
I think he's much less picky than I
that or he's just not looking for what you are
and is surprisingly unsuccessful at it
He's got 2 girls locked in an apparent fight over him
you should try to have a conversation with him sometime, Id be curious to see how that went
I don't know if he actually slept with her or not
I finished it like an hour ago
i mean, were you trying to get drunk?
Well, i wouldn't say I am now
yes, but not directly. he's a contractor
I've installed cable for 6-7 years, and I've never worked for an actual cable company
oh, I talked to one of the guys today, he said they are hiring and is emailing hr for me
But it seems like FedEx would employ their own drivers =/
so this whole working in KoP may be happening pretty soon
or I may end up in delco, it's whatever
Not sure what my apt situation is going to be =/
fedex does hire it's own drivers, but he works for fedex home delivery, as opposed to fedex ground or fedex express
he said he could get me a job there, but I dunno
I make more doing cable, and rather not get up a 5am
Man, Michael is pretty good at racking up points.
I didn't think he'd be this interesting, tbh
see, you should give guys a chance
I mean, I'm the one that gave him my contact information
More or less without his asking/prompting
oh, I meant to ask you that actually
I love how women just give you their number instead of asking for yours
Enh, I have a good reason for that, as far as I'm concerned
I'd rather guys give me their numbers than ask for mine
Then I can decide if I want to reach out
so you don't want to appear threatening?
I tend to bank everything towards equality these days
If I expect/want something from guys, I should act that way myself, right?
that wasn't the impression Ive gotten from you
if you appear to be too 'into' a guy, he generally won't be interested, iirc
That barely effects my actions though, haha
I don't give a shit about any of those guys right now
The only reason I would care if they stopped communicating with me is that I'd want to know why
If I don't care about actually landing them, then why would that effect how I approached/interacted with them?
Even though I do enjoy flirting with Michael, and Andrew was super cute, and Aram was just simply awesome, I'm still not looking to date right now, haha
or, at least, not get into a serious relationship
Why would I want to get in a serious relationship exactly?
truth is, if I meet an awesome girl, I am totally down for a relationship (present company excluded, of course)
but the odds are stacked waaay against it happening
I don't want to go back to super settled
And that's what I do when I'm in a serious relationship
haha, I've just been vouched for again
Not get stupid neurotic because someone said X, or didn't respond for Y amount of time
I don't miss that one bit, but honestly I don't sweat that shit anymore so it's not a huge deal
Well, you have a few years of living on me
I don't anticipate being exactly like this in a few years
Michael and I have exchanged like 130 texts today
yeah, took a while to get here
Fortunately it was almost all through my gvoice number
So I've just been responding through the internet
We've exchanged a lot of background information though
my plans for tomorrow night are canceled
I've exchanged msgs like that heavily, and it didn't really affect me other than to think that the girl must like me
That's kind of a pain in the ass. He's in the city, I'm in the 'burbs.
He has class out in 'Nova on Mondays and Thursdays.
And I'm already going into the city 2-3 times this week.
I've already been trying to set up _something_
ugh, I almost asked claire out again but I stopped myself
I'm just saying, I've asked two guys out this week so far essentially
She obvs has baggage to deal with
it's just annoying, the whole not knowing
and I'll see her on weds and fri and prolly on sat at Josh's
that seems like a bad/complicated concept
if it where a rom com, they would hit it off, forcing us to end up together
that's even worse than what I was thinking, haha
Do you remember what my OkC acct is?
I got an email saying that you were 'checking me out'
from when you looked at my profile like a week ago
Anyway, the "What I spend a lot of time thinking about" or whatev section
I know, mainly because it said, "we thought you might like to know, because she is an exceptional match..."
I was like, "hehe, you guys don't know the half of it.."
is that your way of suggesting something?
I think the thought may have actually crossed my mind
I know what thought crossed your mind
and I love how it came right after swooning over michael's 'game'
He's playing the conversation really well, regardless of intentionality
remember, I tend to talk in hyperbole
I manipulate conversations enough that I can appreciate a master
and how does he fair against, say, me?
He seems interested in actually attracting me
yeah, I'm pretty awful at that
When we were chatting at first, I felt like you were trying to get me to storm off in a rage half the time
wait, what exactly did I say?
damnit! My water is all the way over there!
Are you legit asking me to remember things from years ago?
well if they were that bloody awful then ya
There's a branch of my gym on 202 on the way down to Wilmington
You might not appreciate that, but you should, haha
My finances aren't in the best shape right now, and my gas spending is getting ridiculous
hey, I was willing to drive you back to your car in my gas gussling truck
and I don't even have a job >.<
I spent $200 last month in gas
I've spent that in a WEEK!
And I just paid my $1300 rent/utility bill
My brother owes me $3500 right now
If I had that, money would be no object
So things are tighter than I'm used to them being these days
I have two companies that owe me a combines $7k
I'll try to remember to pack clothes and shit in the morning, and I'll decide tomorrow
How long does it take you to get to work in the morning?
what? I can get to wc from here in 35-40 min
ugh, I have food that I need to cook. >.<
ugh, you're making things difficult, lol
hahaha! I didnt say anything about sex
why else would I come down
based on wc proper since I dont know exactly where you work
but same amount of gas regardless
MY POINT WAS THAT IT WAS MORE
there was no way for me to know that
shit! I left my water over there again
So efi didn't sleep in dans room this time. Not sure what that means
maybe he was out of condoms
and I was just razzing ya earlier. Do what you want, just don't flake
So I've been thinking of visiting my elementary school
I dunno, it's just something I want to do. It was an amazing school, and the first american school I attended when I moved back from costa rica
I went on the website, and I actually got a little emotional
how old were you when you moved here?
most of the same teachers are still there, and it was nearly 25 years ago
well, Mrs. Kehs was pretty young when I had her
hmmm, might want to rephrase that
I'm kinda curious as to whether they would remember me
I was half-awake from like 4-5:30 I think
eh, what's that michael dude's last name?
what's this about being 'in a relationship'?
He alleges to not use/know how to use facebook, and isn't sure how to change it
I'll admit, I don't really use the relationship status thing
at least I haven't in like 2 years
I think there might be a 'seeing someone' but im not sure
There's just "It's Complicated" and "In a Relationship" on FB
then engaged, married, open relationship, etc
i think there's 'in an open relationship' one. Who would ever use that?
Michael's profile does seem to back up his claim
He hasn't actively done anything on it in months and months
unless you're just trying to scare people away
one of his ex's was huge
maybe it's not an ex... she calls him "buddy" in the pic. But they seem pretty physical, haha
the last status he posted was in Feb 2011 haha
he appears to have lost weight, based on his photos
even if he is dating, I did my due diligence
yeah, I mean I try not to be a home wrecker but in the end it's none of my business
I just like everyone to be upfront and honest
hmm, I just tried changing my 'relationship status' and it doesn't give me the option
I don't think I'd ever use the "It's Complicated" option, haha
so anyway, if I do decide to go visit my school this week, turns out your place is on the way
My goal is for that to never be true
I'm pretty much off limits tomorrow
Friday I have plans in the evening, but they're nothing serious
Basically going to the Plymouth Meeting Whole Foods
not to pry, but what are you up to those days?
I'm definitely doing something like 2-5, and then it's bar hopping after that
Im assuming this is in philly
I could probably occupy myself a while
not really sure when I'd get back from visiting the school
I'm going to be doing stuff until late, though
Well, it is if you're trying to occupy yourself =P
I'd ideally like to be out til then, haha
I guess what I meant was, if you're seeing a boy out that night, then nevermind
I try to be realistic with the times Ill be out til
I'm intending to meet up with at least one of the guys from this past weekend
If not all three of them, haha
It might end up staggering that way
One of them might be at the 2-5 event, one of them works for a brewer who has an event I was already planning on going to, and then I might see if Michael wants to meet up
there are a few people I've been meaning to catch up with that live in the general area, so killing a few birds with one stone is appealing at this point
but if they all fall through, then I'm out
It's not a big deal. We can just wait until Saturday, lol
and I wouldn't mind hanging in philly a but, but wouldn't want to cramp your style
not that bit, but is much better
